  • Uses of ExitReport in launcher

    Methods in launcher with parameters of type ExitReport
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private static void
    Launcher.endCurrentInstance(ExitReport exitReport)
    Exits the current instance of execution.

    Closes the Launcher.engineCore by calling EngineCore.close(), then waits for the Launcher.engineThread to finish execution with Thread.interrupt() and Thread.join(), before finally closing the Launcher.engineWatchdog with EngineWatchdog.close().
    static void
    Launcher.exit(ExitReport exitReport)
    Exits the entire JVM instance and the program execution completely.

    Calls Launcher.endCurrentInstance(ExitReport) and then System.exit(int).
    static void
    Launcher.relaunch(ExitReport exitReport)
    Relaunches the program.

    Ends the current instance of execution with Launcher.endCurrentInstance(ExitReport), before calling the Launcher.main(String[]) method, passing in the original String[] Launcher.args first supplied at initial execution.

  • Uses of ExitReport in launcher.watchdog

    Fields in launcher.watchdog declared as ExitReport
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static ExitReport
    EngineWatchdog.exitReport
    Null until an ExitReport is received by EngineWatchdog.submitExitReport(ExitReport), which sets this value to the ExitReport received.

    This causes the WATCHDOG_THREAD to break out of the while loop in EngineWatchdog.start(), and handle the ExitReport accordingly.
    Methods in launcher.watchdog with parameters of type ExitReport
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private void
    EngineWatchdog.onExitReport(ExitReport exitReport)
    Handles exiting of program when an ExitReport is submitted.

    Called by EngineWatchdog.start() when EngineWatchdog.exitReport becomes non-null, signifying the program wants to exit.

    Logs the ExitReport, and then calls either ExitHandler.onExit(ExitReport) on EngineWatchdog.exitHandler, or CrashHandler.onCrash(CrashReport) on EngineWatchdog.crashHandler, depending on the value of isClean(), to handle the report accordingly.
    static void
    EngineWatchdog.submitExitReport(ExitReport exitReport)
    Sets the EngineWatchdog.exitReport to the ExitReport passed in.

    This causes the WATCHDOG_THREAD to break out of the while loop in EngineWatchdog.start(), to then handle the report accordingly.

    abstract void
    ExitHandler.onExit(ExitReport exitReport)
    The actions which should be undertaken when the EngineWatchdog receives a clean ExitReport.
